alert.note: Alert for Irion; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 10 at 2:16AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Tom Green and eastern Irion Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 214 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Us-67 Near The Irion- Tom Green County Line, or near Tankersley, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mertzon, Christoval, Knickerbocker, Twin Buttes Reservoir, Tankersley, Sherwood and Us-67 Near The Irion-Tom Green County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall up to 1 inch is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
